briefdescription.para: Parser state machine states for syntax validation.

detaileddescription.para: Defines transition states used during mathematical expression parsing to ensure proper grammar and operator precedence.

briefdescription.para: Calculation progress phases for user feedback.

detaileddescription.para: Tracks current processing stage to display meaningful progress information during long calculations.

briefdescription.para: Parser configuration constants and validation sets.

detaileddescription.para: Character sets for input validation, window dimensions, and global state management for the calculation workflow.

simplesect.para: true if first character follows mathematical grammar rules
true if all parentheses are properly matched and nested
true if expression follows proper mathematical grammar

detaileddescription.para:
true if input passes character, syntax, and structure validation
Combines all validation functions to ensure safe processing of mathematical expressions before tokenization and calculation.
Processes input through validation, tokenization, calculation, and result formatting with timing measurements.

Coordinates the complete calculation workflow:
Input processing and cleaning
Validation of mathematical expression
Tokenization and parsing
High-precision calculation
Result formatting and timing

briefdescription.para: Renders real-time calculation progress in ImGui.

detaileddescription.para: Displays phase-appropriate progress information including progress bars for long calculations.
Creates the primary interface for input, calculation trigger, and result display using ImGui framework.
Creates fixed-size window with multiline input field, calculate button, and result display area. Handles user interaction events and triggers calculation workflow.
